name: Game Dev Chan
description:
What does it mean to follow your dreams? Game Dev Chan follows you as the main protagonist. You take a job for Something Games as a composer for all their music making needs. Get to know your co workers as you work towards your goals. Following your dreams isn't always easy however. Learning to overcome challenges and pull together is essential for any team. Can your team come together and achieve their goals or will they give in? 

Length - About 2 hours long give or take reading speed.
